LanguageData.MainTabWindowDescription: This tab contains lots of useful functions. Clean,boost,or even fix your current savegame here.
LanguageData.DlgTextGCAdvice1: World Pawn removal has been disabled. This feature is buggy, broke save files and the 1.4 update also appears to have a built in clean up feature making this unnecessary. If you still want to use this function, the original dll file has been included in the mod folder, simply replace the dll in /1.4/Assemblies/ with the one in /Original Dll/
LanguageData.DlgTextGCAdvice2: There are still {0} WorldPawn(s) to remove. Press again to complete a thorough clean-up.
LanguageData.DlgTextGCV: RuntimeGC: Check detailed output in Debug Log
LanguageData.MMTip: .NET VM Usage: {0:F2} Mb Unity framework and bulk game assets are not included.
LanguageData.MsgLanguageDataCleaned: {0} Unused languages removed and {1} translation injections cleaned.
